p: C6/36 ( Aedes albopictus) and Vero cells were maintained in Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s Medium (Gibco, Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA) and duck embryonic fibroblast cells (DEF) were maintained in Eagle’s Minimum Essential media (EMEM, ATCC) with 10% heat-inactivated fetal bovine serum and 100U/mL and 100ug/mL of Penicillin/Streptomycin, respectively, at 28°C (mosquito cells) and 37°C for vertebrate cells. HD11 chicken monocytes were kindly provided by Dr. Kirk Klasing (UC Davis) and were maintained in RPMI 1640 media at 37°C. Vero cells were used for all plaque assays in this study.
